byline.original: By SIMON ROMERO and MARÍA EUGENIA DÍAZ

abstract: Saturday Profile of Leopoldo Lopez, one of the strongest challengers in the quest to unseat Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez in the 2012 presidential election.
snippet: One of the strongest challengers seeking to unseat President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela is Leopoldo López, an activist with the blood of the family that spawned Mr. Chavez’s hero, Simón Bolívar, in his veins.
lead_paragraph: One of the strongest challengers seeking to unseat President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela is Leopoldo López, an activist with the blood of the family that spawned Mr. Chavez’s hero, Simón Bolívar, in his veins.

headline.main: A Bolívar Ready to Fight Against the Bolivarian State
headline.print_headline: A Bolívar Ready to Fight Against the Bolivarian State
headline.seo: A Bolívar Prepares for a Fight in Venezuela
